title: People Never Marry The Person They Have The Best Bedroom Experience With?!
description:
Is it true that nobody marries their best bedroom experience ever?
According to a study by iVillage less than half of wedded women married the person who was the best bedroom experience of their lives (52 percent say that was an ex.) That same study shows that 66% of people would rather read a book, watch a movie or take a nap than to sleep with their spouse
Amanda Chantel (33) told the New York Post that she knows her greatest bedroom experience was temporary and because of that it was the best because that’s all the relationship could offer. “We didn’t have to invest in anything else.” that Women admits that it didn’t have the intensity that came with toxic relationships.
She adds that when it comes to the men she’s loved, the experience was good, sometimes ever great but the intensity that comes with her toxic relationships isn’t there.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting
